aecce38d-af5a-494a-9c31-d6b8cf4c9139.name: Code of Honor (Winged Folk's)
aecce38d-af5a-494a-9c31-d6b8cf4c9139.notes: Reciprocity: Repay favors and injuries in full.  Hospitality: Be as good a guest or host as you can.  Piety: Show reverence to gods and ancestors alike.

0681a51a-d5a1-4b33-932b-53413d933e59.name: Crippled Wings
0681a51a-d5a1-4b33-932b-53413d933e59.notes: Must separately reduce Air Move to Basic Speed (you get full points for this)

60db2385-394f-4c9a-9874-f7b41643d4de.name: Dancing Kicks
60db2385-394f-4c9a-9874-f7b41643d4de.notes: Can default kicking techniques to Aerobatics

7c11a327-88cb-4c6d-85e4-f38447200836.name: Iron Wings
7c11a327-88cb-4c6d-85e4-f38447200836.notes: Can purchase wing DR or wing strikers

f4539451-94b3-43d5-9ba7-db5b6345b002.name: Lame (Crippled Legs)
f4539451-94b3-43d5-9ba7-db5b6345b002.notes: You must reduce your Basic Move to half your Basic Speed (round down)

c6172670-8744-4d7b-af03-2108fd5da91f.name: Lame (Legless)
c6172670-8744-4d7b-af03-2108fd5da91f.notes: You cannot stand, kick, or walk at all and must reduce Basic Move to 0.

ab8269a2-8435-4821-b1f5-e774a652d9be.name: Lame (Missing Legs)
ab8269a2-8435-4821-b1f5-e774a652d9be.notes: Using crutches or a peg leg, you can stand up and walk slowly. You must reduce Basic Move to 2.

deef82fc-99c6-4305-97dc-ed9bcea7fe04.name: Lame (Paraplegic)
deef82fc-99c6-4305-97dc-ed9bcea7fe04.notes: You cannot stand, kick, or walk at all and must reduce Basic Move to 0.

5823a2de-31c7-46d8-8c37-2804f158e774.name: Racial Gifts (Winged Folk)
5823a2de-31c7-46d8-8c37-2804f158e774.notes: Permits Winged Folk enhanced dodge, silence, telescopic vision

60bd1ef3-389f-47cc-a5b5-b7a708177593.name: Silence
60bd1ef3-389f-47cc-a5b5-b7a708177593.notes: Only when unmoving or flying (-20%). Bonuses help only when hearing is the only sense that can be used to detect you.

931f6d0d-c689-47e9-9ccc-dd53a7c30edb.name: Social Regard (Revered)
931f6d0d-c689-47e9-9ccc-dd53a7c30edb.notes: Seen as holy and good luck to be around

81d89603-e8e9-4496-b644-31160d9b72c3.name: Special Excercises
81d89603-e8e9-4496-b644-31160d9b72c3.notes: Can buy off limitations on Flight
